standup.title: Draw your update
standup.summary: Each team member draws what they're working on in JS Paint and the others guess what it is.
standup.description: Team members share their screens in turn and use https://jspaint.app/ to draw something that they're working on. The others guess what it is. The rules are similar to those of a Pictionary game: the person who is presenting is not allowed to talk or write words. And the drawing needs to happen while everyone is watching.
benefits: It is very hard to draw the abstract things that we do all day - especially in JS Paint. This will make team members more comfortable with being vulnerable in front of the team.
